reviews.review_msg: avoid avoid avoid!!!!! makes no effort to help or clarify, exams are unclear she is unclear, does not welcome comments, does not welcome anything from anyone sitting farther than three rows back from her - horrible teaching style. I am changing my major because her attitude and teaching of the content made me hate the subject so much

Had her for 103, very different prof for 201.  She is probably one of the easier 201 profs.  Her lectures are all theoretical but then when it comes to the tests you need to know the numbers and derivatives.  Pay attention to the tutorial assignments and practice midterm and you'll do okay. Practice derivatives before you start the class.
